## R Markdown

```{r}
# install.packages("arules")

library(arules)
data <- read.csv("AppleStore.csv", head = TRUE)

data_clean <- na.omit(data)

```

## HCLUST

```{r}
distance = dist(as.matrix(data_clean), method = "euclidean")

# perform clustering
hc = hclust(distance)
clusterCut <- cutree(hc, 10)
#library(cluster)
#clusplot(clusterCut, color=TRUE, shade=TRUE, labels=2, lines=0)
                
# plot dendrogram
plot(hc)
```
